name: SCP-999 Care sim
description:
Cute little pet sim game where you take care of loveable SCP-999! 

Currently endless just enjoy keeping SCP-999 stats up or annoying them whatever you want to do.

Future update plans: 

-Unlock new rooms for SCP-999 to enjoy the more time you spend with them! 

-Unlock hats and skins for SCP-999!

-Add a 'entertainment bar' as another stat to keep track

-Add a losing state

"Content relating to the SCP Foundation, including the SCP Foundation logo, is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0 and all concepts originate from https://scpwiki.com/ and its authors. [SCP-999 Care sim], being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 3.0."
